title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 11 July 2008 - XWiki
content:
continuum - (11/07/2008 00:44): BUILD FAILURE: XWiki Products - Enterprise - LDAP Functional Tests http://continuum.xwiki.org/continuum/buildResult.action?buildId=33096&projectId=259  
daning - (11/07/2008 12:46): Hi. I'm develop a office import application. In my opinion, a xwiki application is a set of xwiki docs in xar file. Am I right?   
daning - (11/07/2008 12:46): I want to export multi xwiki page to a xar. How to do that? I only can export a xar a page every time.  
jvdrean - (11/07/2008 12:50): http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/edit/AdminGuide/ImportExportSnippet  
jvdrean - (11/07/2008 12:51): (you have to edit the page in order to get the code, the html contained in the page breaks our code view)  
SaiKrishna - (11/07/2008 18:47): Hi David
